name: On Crunch's Edge!
description:
Made for VitJam2, this is a short game that takes only 50 seconds from start to finish, you are the boss of a failing company, it's your job to direct a small group of developers in order to create one more game, at the end you can see your performance in the form of a newspaper headline.

You get 4 options, and you must choose from these, each has its own hidden effect, some more are more clear than others. crunch your team or reward them for their hard work, it's up to you!

Music made by: David Renda.

Pixel Art by: Shubibubi and Mateo Saldivar.

Programming and design by: Mateo Saldivar (Ziro Dev).

For the Diversifiers I focused on Quick Run and Symmetry.
